name: Pipeliner
description:
This game is part of a dissertation of Peerawat Ritthakorn, a student in MSc Serious Games and Virtual Reality at the Glasgow School of Art. The purpose of the game is to evaluate the effectiveness of using serious games to teach programming. After playing the game, it would be much appreciated to fill out the survey.

https://forms.gle/ZMjZhgYmPPpioaNa7

If you have any questions, you can contact me at: p.ritthakorn1@student.gsa.ac.uk
